mapper.select: select user_code as userCode, role, version from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userCode} and is_delete = 0

select od.order_code as orderCode, od.cus_code as cusCode, us.user_name as cusName, us.phone, od.sum_price as sumPrice, od.order_Status as orderStatus, od.pay_time as payTime, od.store_code as storeCode, od.remarks, od.is_delete as isDelete, od.creater, od.create_time as createTime, od.updater, od.update_time as updateTime, od.version from t_sys_order od left join t_sys_user us on (od.cus_code = us.user_code) where od.is_delete = 0
AND od.store_code in (select store_code from t_sys_store where user_code = #{operator})
AND us.user_name like concat ('%',#{cusName},'%')
AND od.order_code like concat ('%',#{orderCode},'%')
AND od.pay_time >= DATE_FORMAT( #{payTimeStart} ,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%S')
AND od.pay_time <= DATE_FORMAT( #{payTimeOver} ,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%S')
AND us.phone like concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
AND od.order_status = #{orderStatus}
order by od.create_time desc

select od.cus_code as cusCode, od.order_code as orderCode, odd.ord_details_code as ordDetailsCode, odd.goods_code as goodsCode, goods.goods_name as goodsName, odd.buy_count as buyCount, odd.sum_price as sumPrice, goods.sellprice as sellPrice from t_sys_order od left join t_sys_order_details odd on (od.order_code = odd.order_code) left join t_sys_goods goods on (odd.goods_code = goods.goods_code) where od.is_delete = 0 and od.order_code = #{orderCode} order by odd.create_time desc
